faqs.question: What are the admission requirements for GNDEC?
faqs.answer: The admission requirements may vary each year. Generally, admission to GNDEC is based on entrance exams such as JEE Main, followed by counseling conducted by the college or state authorities.

faqs.question: Does GNDEC provide hostel facilities?
faqs.answer: Yes, GNDEC provides separate hostel facilities for both male and female students.

faqs.question: What extracurricular activities are available at GNDEC?
faqs.answer: GNDEC encourages students to participate in a wide range of extracurricular activities, including sports, cultural events, technical competitions, and various student clubs.

faqs.question: Does GNDEC have industry collaborations?
faqs.answer: Yes, GNDEC has established collaborations with various industries and organizations to provide students with internship opportunities, industrial training, and placements.

faqs.question: Is there a placement cell at GNDEC?
faqs.answer: Yes, GNDEC has an active placement cell that assists students in securing job placements by organizing campus recruitment drives, inviting companies for placements, and providing training for interviews.

faqs.question: What are the facilities available on the GNDEC campus?
faqs.answer: GNDEC offers state-of-the-art infrastructure, including well-equipped laboratories, a library, auditoriums, sports facilities, cafeteria, and modern classrooms.

faqs.question: Does GNDEC organize technical events and conferences?

faqs.question: Who is the principal of the college
What is the tentative date for direct counseling and how to apply for it
faqs.answer:
The tentative date for announcement of direct counseling in GNDEC is Mid of June. A notification regarding this will be put on the website of this college and an advertisement will also be given in the leading newspaper(s) of the state. For participating in direct
            counseling candidate has to enroll online on the direct admission portal of this college (this
            portal will be active only after the announcement of direct admission) and then
            send/submit by hand, the hard copy of filled form along with demand draft of direct fee in
            the academic section of GNDEC

faqs.question: What is the detail of various courses of B.Tech and intake in each course in GNDEC?
faqs.answer:
Detail of various courses along with intake can be obtained from the following link:
            http://www.gndec.ac.in/sites/default/files/Courses_1.pdf
